trans-unit.source: If LACP detects a failure in a member link, it removes the link from the link aggregation.

trans-unit.source: If Netmask is omitted after IP address, /32 is assumed.

trans-unit.source: If None (the default) the plugin will try to automatically guess the correct list
trans-unit.target: 如果没有(默认),插件将尝试自动猜测正确的列表。

trans-unit.source: If None is passed SSH public keys will not be checked or changed.

trans-unit.source: If None is passed email addresses will not be checked or changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过 "无",则不会检查或更改电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: If None is passed telephone numbers will not be checked or changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过 "无",则不会检查或更改电话号码。

trans-unit.source: If PEM-formatted content was provided for private_key, this defaults to the username value.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 private_key 提供了PEM格式的内容，则默认为 username 值。

trans-unit.source: If Panorama, the device group to put this rule in.

trans-unit.source: If SMTP requires password.
trans-unit.target: 如果SMTP需要密码。

trans-unit.source: If SMTP requires username.
trans-unit.target: 如果SMTP需要用户名。

trans-unit.source: If Sensu should monitor keepalives for this client.
trans-unit.target: 如果Sensu应该监控这个客户的keepalives。

trans-unit.source: If True host iptables will be overridden by host deploy script.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,主机iptables将被主机部署脚本覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If True wait for the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,则等待响应。

trans-unit.source: If True, it adds config-context in host vars.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,则在host vars中添加config-context。

trans-unit.source: If True, system firmware will use UEFI boot explicitly beyond next boot.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,系统固件将在下次启动后明确使用UEFI引导。

trans-unit.source: If True, system firmware will use this device beyond next boot.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,系统固件将在下次启动后使用该设备。

trans-unit.source: If True, this IP address will listen for DNS queries for the dnszone specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,该IP地址将监听指定dnszone的DNS查询。

trans-unit.source: If VM already exists, this setting will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果虚拟机已经存在,则此设置将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If VM don't exists name is required. Otherwise id or name can be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果VM不存在，则需要 name 。否则，可以使用 id 或 name 。

trans-unit.source: If VM is in UNASSIGNED or UNKNOWN state before any operation, the module will fail. If VM is in IMAGE_LOCKED state before any operation, we try to wait for VM to be DOWN. If VM is in SAVING_STATE state before any operation, we try to wait for VM to be SUSPENDED. If VM is in POWERING_DOWN state before any operation, we try to wait for VM to be UP or DOWN. VM can get into UP state from POWERING_DOWN state, when there is no ACPI or guest agent running inside VM, or if the shutdown operation fails. When user specify UPstate, we always wait to VM to be in UP state in case VM is MIGRATING, REBOOTING, POWERING_UP, RESTORING_STATE, WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH. In other states we run start operation on VM. When user specify stoppedstate, and If user pass force parameter set to true we forcibly stop the VM in any state. If user don’t pass force parameter, we always wait to VM to be in UP state in case VM is MIGRATING, REBOOTING, POWERING_UP, RESTORING_STATE, WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH. If VM is in PAUSED or SUSPENDED state, we start the VM. Then we gracefully shutdown the VM. When user specify suspendedstate, we always wait to VM to be in UP state in case VM is MIGRATING, REBOOTING, POWERING_UP, RESTORING_STATE, WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH. If VM is in PAUSED or DOWN state, we start the VM. Then we suspend the VM. When user specify absentstate, we forcibly stop the VM in any state and remove it.
trans-unit.target: 如果在执行任何操作之前，VM处于UNASSIGNED或UNKNOWN状态，则该模块将失败。如果在执行任何操作之前VM处于IMAGE_LOCKED状态，我们将尝试等待VM处于DOWN状态。如果在执行任何操作之前VM处于SAVING_STATE状态，我们将尝试等待VM被SUSPENDED。如果在执行任何操作之前VM处于POWERING_DOWN状态，我们将尝试等待VM处于UP或DOWN状态。当VM内没有运行ACPI或来宾代理时，或者关闭操作失败时，VM可以从POWERING_DOWN状态进入UP状态。当用户指定UP state ，我们总是等待VM处于UP状态，以防VM处于MIGRATING，REBOOTING，POWERING_UP，RESTORING_STATE，WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH的情况。在其他状态下，我们在VM上运行启动操作。当用户指定停止 state ，并且如果用户将 force 参数设置为true时，我们将在任何状态下强制停止VM。如果用户未传递 force 参数，则在VM为MIGRATING，REBOOTING，POWERING_UP，RESTORING_STATE，WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH的情况下，我们始终等待VM处于UP状态。如果VM处于PAUSED或SUSPENDED状态，我们将启动VM。然后，我们正常关闭虚拟机。当用户指定挂起 state ，我们总是等待VM处于UP状态，以防VM处于MIGRATING，REBOOTING，POWERING_UP，RESTORING_STATE，WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH的情况。如果VM处于PAUSED或DOWN状态，我们将启动VM。然后我们挂起VM。当用户指定不存在 state ，我们会强制以任何状态停止VM并将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If a database_name is specified we remove it.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 database_name ，我们将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If a private_key filename was provided, this defaults to the private_key basename, without extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 private_key 文件名，则默认为 private_key 基本名，不带扩展名。

trans-unit.source: If a checksum is passed to this parameter, the digest of the destination file will be calculated after it is downloaded to ensure its integrity and verify that the transfer completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果将校验和传递给此参数，则在下载目标文件后将对其进行计算，以确保其完整性并验证传输是否成功完成。

trans-unit.source: If a Python interpreter is discovered, Ansible uses the discovered Python, even if /usr/bin/python is also present. Warns when using the fallback list.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现了Python解释器，即使/ usr / bin / python也存在，Ansible也会使用发现的Python 。使用后备列表时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: If a Python interpreter is discovered, and /usr/bin/python is absent, Ansible uses the discovered Python. Warns when using the fallback list.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现了Python解释器，并且/ usr / bin / python不存在，则Ansible将使用发现的Python。使用后备列表时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: If a Python interpreter is discovered, and /usr/bin/python is present, Ansible uses /usr/bin/python and prints a deprecation warning about future default behavior. Warns when using the fallback list.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现了Python解释器，并且存在/ usr / bin / python，则Ansible将使用/ usr / bin / python并显示有关未来默认行为的弃用警告。使用后备列表时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: If a SHA-256 checksum is passed to this parameter, the digest of the destination file will be calculated after it is downloaded to ensure its integrity and verify that the transfer completed successfully. This option is deprecated. Use checksum instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将SHA-256校验和传递给此参数，则将在下载目标文件之后计算该目标文件的摘要，以确保其完整性并验证传输是否成功完成。不建议使用此选项。请改用 checksum 。

trans-unit.source: If a TSIG key is configured for the zone, the signature is only validated for consume and repeat actions.
trans-unit.target: 如果为该区域配置了TSIG密钥，则仅对 consume 和 repeat 操作验证签名。

trans-unit.source: If a certificate is being reissued or renewed, this parameter is ignored, and the cert_type of the initial certificate is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果要重新发行或更新证书， cert_type 忽略此参数，并使用初始证书的cert_type。

trans-unit.source: If a certificate was issued within the past 30 days, the 'renew' operation is not a valid operation and will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果证书是在过去30天内签发的,则 "更新 "操作不是有效操作,会失败。

trans-unit.source: If a change was made, will return the patched object, otherwise returns the existing object.
trans-unit.target: 如果进行了修改,将返回修补后的对象,否则返回现有对象。

trans-unit.source: If a checksum is passed to this parameter, the digest of the destination file will be calculated after it is downloaded to ensure its integrity and verify that the transfer completed successfully. Format: <algorithm>:<checksum|url>, e.g. checksum="sha256:D98291AC[...]B6DC7B97", checksum="sha256:http://example.com/path/sha256sum.txt"
trans-unit.target: 如果将校验和传递给此参数，则将在下载目标文件之后计算该目标文件的摘要，以确保其完整性并验证传输是否成功完成。格式：<算法>：<校验和| URL>，例如校验和=“ sha256：D98291AC [...] B6DC7B97”，校验和=“ sha256：http：//example.com/path/sha256sum.txt”

trans-unit.source: If a client is able to load a page in less than the satisfactory latency threshold, the pageload is considered satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端能够在小于满意延迟阈值的情况下加载页面,则认为页面加载满意。

trans-unit.source: If a client receives an http response in less than the satisfactory latency threshold, the request is considered satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端收到的http响应小于满意的延迟阈值,则认为该请求是满意的。

trans-unit.source: If a command sent to the device requires answering a prompt, it is possible to pass a dict containing command, answer and prompt. See examples.
trans-unit.target: 如果发送给设备的命令需要回答提示，则可以传递包含command，answer和提示符的字典。参见示例。

trans-unit.source: If a deregistration event should be created upon Sensu client process stop.
trans-unit.target: 如果在Sensu客户端进程停止时,需要创建一个取消注册事件。

trans-unit.source: If a destination IP address matches more than one IP pattern, the pattern with the longest match is selected, and the associated virtual server processes the request. For example, if the virtual servers, vs1 and vs2, have the same IP pattern, 0.0.100.128, but different IP masks of 0.0.255.255 and 0.0.224.255, a destination IP address of 198.51.100.128 has the longest match with the IP pattern of vs1. If a destination IP address matches two or more virtual servers to the same extent, the request is processed by the virtual server whose port number matches the port number in the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标IP地址匹配多个IP模式，则选择匹配时间最长的模式，并且关联的虚拟服务器将处理该请求。例如，如果虚拟服务器 vs1 和 vs2 具有相同的IP模式 0.0.100.128 ，但具有不同的IP掩码 0.0.255.255 和 0.0.224.255 ，则目标IP地址198.51.100.128与该IP的匹配时间最长 vs1 的模式。如果目标IP地址在相同程度上与两个或多个虚拟服务器匹配，则该请求将由其端口号与请求中的端口号匹配的虚拟服务器处理。

trans-unit.source: If a destination IP address matches more than one IP pattern, the pattern with the longest match is selected, and the associated virtual server processes the request. For example, if virtual servers vs1 and vs2 have the same IP pattern, 0.0.100.128, but different IP masks of 0.0.255.255 and 0.0.224.255, a destination IP address of 198.51.100.128 has the longest match with the IP pattern of vs1. If a destination IP address matches two or more virtual servers to the same extent, the request is processed by the virtual server whose port number matches the port number in the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标IP地址匹配多个IP模式，则选择匹配时间最长的模式，并且关联的虚拟服务器将处理该请求。例如，如果虚拟服务器 vs1 和 vs2 具有相同的IP模式， 0.0.100.128 ，但不同的IP掩码 0.0.255.255 和 0.0.224.255 的目的IP地址 198.51.100.128 与VS1的IP模式的最长匹配。如果目标IP地址在相同程度上与两个或多个虚拟服务器匹配，则该请求将由其端口号与请求中的端口号匹配的虚拟服务器处理。

trans-unit.source: If a dict with the keys name and resource_group, the image is sourced from a custom image based on the name and resource_group set. Note that the key resource_group is optional and if omitted, all images in the subscription will be searched for by name.
trans-unit.target: 如果字典的键名为name和resource_group，则该图像是基于名称和resource_group集从定制图像中获取的。请注意，键resource_group是可选的，如果省略，则将按name搜索预订中的所有图像。

trans-unit.source: If a dict with the keys publisher, offer, sku, and version, the image is sourced from a Marketplace image. Note that set version=latest to get the most recent version of a given image.
trans-unit.target: 如果字典包含密钥Publisher，offer，sku和version，则该图像来自Marketplace图像。请注意，设置version = latest可以获取给定图像的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: If a different version of package is installed, state must be latest or force set to yes to install the desired version.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了其他版本的软件包，则状态必须为 latest 或者强制设置为“ yes 以安装所需的版本。

trans-unit.source: If a directory matching the name of the role already exists in the current working directory, the init command will result in an error. To ignore the error use the –force option. Force will create the above subdirectories and files, replacing anything that matches.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前工作目录中已经存在与角色名称匹配的目录，则init命令将导致错误。要忽略该错误，请使用–force选项。Force将创建上述子目录和文件，替换所有匹配的内容。

trans-unit.source: If a directory name is given, all files in the directory and its subdirectories will be scanned and tried to be parsed as concatenated certificates in PEM format.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定了一个目录名,该目录及其子目录中的所有文件都将被扫描,并尝试解析为PEM格式的连接证书。

trans-unit.source: If a host does not have the variables in the configuration above (i.e. tags.Name, tags, private_ip_address), the host will not be added to groups other than those that the inventory plugin creates and the ansible_host host variable will not be modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机在上面的配置中没有变量（即 tags.Name ， tags ， private_ip_address ），则该主机将不会添加到清单插件创建的主机之外的其他组，并且不会修改 ansible_host 主机变量。

trans-unit.source: If a host is not connected at time of configuration, it will be marked as such in the output.
trans-unit.target: 如果在配置时主机没有连接,则会在输出中标明。

trans-unit.source: If a host is reinstalled and has a different key in ‘known_hosts’, this will result in an error message until corrected. If a new host is not in ‘known_hosts’ your control node may prompt for confirmation of the key, which results in an interactive experience if using Ansible, from say, cron. You might not want this.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机被重新安装并且在“ known_hosts”中具有不同的密钥，这将导致错误消息，直到更正为止。如果新主机不在“ known_hosts”中，则您的控制节点可能会提示您确认密钥，如果使用来自cron的Ansible，则会产生交互体验。您可能不想要这个。

trans-unit.source: If a host was found but had no LAPS password attribute ms-Mcs-AdmPwd, the lookup will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了主机，但是没有LAPS密码属性 ms-Mcs-AdmPwd ，则查找将失败。

trans-unit.source: If a hostname is given, it will be resolved to the IP address.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了主机名,将被解析为IP地址。

trans-unit.source: If a known method is deleted from the known_methods list, the BIG-IP system applies the unknown_method setting to manage that traffic.
trans-unit.target: 如果从 known_methods 列表中删除了已知方法，则BIG-IP系统将应用 unknown_method 设置来管理该流量。

trans-unit.source: If a matching job is present a new job will not be added.
trans-unit.target: 如果有匹配的工作,将不会增加新的工作。

trans-unit.source: If a member does not respond in time, other members mark the delinquent member as inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 如果会员没有及时回复,其他会员就会将该不良会员标记为无法进入。

trans-unit.source: If a network interface name is not provided when the VM is created, a default network interface will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建虚拟机时没有提供网络接口名称,将创建一个默认网络接口。

trans-unit.source: If a new enough version of the cryptography library is available (see Requirements for details), it will be used instead of the openssl binary. This can be explicitly disabled or enabled with the select_crypto_backend option. Note that using the openssl binary will be slower and less secure, as private key contents always have to be stored on disk (see account_key_content).
trans-unit.target: 如果有足够新版本的 cryptography 库（请参阅要求，以获取详细信息），它将使用它来代替 openssl 二进制文件。可以显式禁用或使用 select_crypto_backend 选项启用它。请注意，使用 openssl 二进制文件会更慢且安全性较低，因为私钥内容始终必须存储在磁盘上（请参阅 account_key_content ）。

trans-unit.source: If a new group is created then security will be used by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建了新组，则默认情况下将使用 security 。

trans-unit.source: If a playbook has a ./library directory relative to its YAML file, this directory can be used to add ansible modules that will automatically be in the ansible module path. This is a great way to keep modules that go with a playbook together. This is shown in the directory structure example at the start of this section.
trans-unit.target: 如果剧本具有相对于其YAML文件的 ./library 目录，则此目录可用于添加将自动位于ansible模块路径中的ansible模块。这是将与剧本一起使用的模块保持在一起的好方法。这在本节开始的目录结构示例中显示。

trans-unit.source: If a port is not in the list, but present on the target, it will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个端口不在列表中,但存在于目标机上,它将被删除。

trans-unit.source: If a port is of type trunk, the specified VLAN is the native VLAN.
trans-unit.target: 如果端口的类型是 trunk,则指定的 VLAN 是本地 VLAN。

trans-unit.source: If a port is present in this list, but not on the target, it will be added.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个端口存在于此列表中,但不在目标上,则会被添加。

trans-unit.source: If a port number is not provided then 27017 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供端口号,则假定为27017。

trans-unit.source: If a previous version is specified, the task also needs to turn allow_downgrade on. See the allow_downgrade documentation for caveats with downgrading packages.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了先前版本，则该任务还需要打开 allow_downgrade 。有关降级软件包的注意事项，请参见 allow_downgrade 文档。

trans-unit.source: If a profile for another user already exists at the same path, then a 3 digit incremental number is appended by Windows automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果同一路径上已经存在另一个用户的配置文件,那么Windows会自动添加一个3位递增的数字。

trans-unit.source: If a protection group exists and you try to add non-valid types, eg. a host to a volume protection group the module will ignore the invalid types.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在一个保护组,并且您尝试添加非有效类型,例如,主机到卷保护组,模块将忽略无效类型。

trans-unit.source: If a query type is not recognized, Ansible will raise an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询类型未被识别,Ansible将引发一个错误。

trans-unit.source: If a remotely managed system has an /etc/ansible/facts.d directory, any files in this directory ending in .fact, can be JSON, INI, or executable files returning JSON, and these can supply local facts in Ansible. An alternate directory can be specified using the fact_path play keyword.
trans-unit.target: 如果远程管理系统具有 /etc/ansible/facts.d 目录，则此目录中以 .fact 结尾的任何文件都可以是JSON，INI或返回JSON的可执行文件，并且这些文件可以在Ansible中提供本地事实。可以使用 fact_path play关键字指定备用目录。

trans-unit.source: If a required variable has not been set, you can skip or fail using Jinja2’s defined test. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未设置必需的变量，则可以使用Jinja2的已 defined 测试跳过或失败。例如：

trans-unit.source: If a rule declares a group_name and that group doesn’t exist, it will be automatically created. In that case, group_desc should be provided as well. The module will refuse to create a depended-on group without a description.
trans-unit.target: 如果规则声明了group_name且该组不存在，它将自动创建。在这种情况下，还应该提供group_desc。该模块将拒绝创建没有说明的依赖组。

trans-unit.source: If a screen has already been added, the screen name won't be updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经添加了一个屏幕,屏幕名称将不会被更新。

trans-unit.source: If a shutdown was already scheduled on the system, win_reboot will abort the scheduled shutdown and enforce its own shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经在系统上安排了关机，则 win_reboot 将中止计划的关机并强制执行自己的关机。

trans-unit.source: If a similar output displays then everything is setup properly, else please ensure the proper VULTR_API_KEY has been specified and that Access Control on Vultr > Account > API page are accurate.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示类似的输出，则说明一切设置正确，否则，请确保已指定正确的 VULTR_API_KEY ,并且Vultr>“帐户”>“ API”页面上的访问控制正确。

trans-unit.source: If a site of the same name exists in the account but on a different host, the operation will exit.
trans-unit.target: 如果账户中存在同名网站,但在不同的主机上,操作将退出。

trans-unit.source: If a snapshot group with an identical name already exists but with a different base volume an error will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经存在具有相同 name 但具有不同基本卷的快照组，则将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: If a specific tunnel does not support the parameter you are considering, the documentation of the parameter will usually make mention of this. Otherwise, when configuring that parameter on the device, the device will notify you.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个特定的隧道不支持你正在考虑的参数,该参数的文档通常会提到这一点。否则,在设备上配置该参数时,设备会通知你。

trans-unit.source: If a stacks fails to form, rollback will remove the stack
trans-unit.target: 如果堆栈未能形成,回滚将删除堆栈。

trans-unit.source: If a string, the image is sourced from a custom image based on the name.
trans-unit.target: 如果是字符串,则根据名称从自定义图像中获取图像。

trans-unit.source: If a supplied key is missing this will make the task fail if yes.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的密钥丢失，这将使得任务失败，如果 yes 。

trans-unit.target: 如果表的 "过期时间 "在表过期前被修改或删除,或者在创建表时提供了明确的 "过期时间",则该值优先于此属性所指示的默认过期时间。

trans-unit.source: If a task fails or is skipped, the variable still is registered with a failure or skipped status, the only way to avoid registering a variable is using tags.
trans-unit.target: 如果任务失败或被跳过,变量仍然以失败或跳过的状态被注册,避免注册变量的唯一方法是使用标签。

trans-unit.source: If a task needs to be executed, you have to set the flag the same as it is specified in the inventory for that device.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个任务需要执行,你必须设置与该设备的清单中指定的相同的标志。

trans-unit.source: If a variable value set in an INI inventory must be a certain type (for example, a string or a boolean value), always specify the type with a filter in your task. Do not rely on types set in INI inventories when consuming variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 INI 清单中设置的变量值必须是某种类型(例如,字符串或布尔值),请始终在任务中用过滤器指定类型。在消耗变量时,不要依赖INI清单中设置的类型。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs, a description of the error.

trans-unit.source: If an even number of backslashes is followed by a double quote, one backslash is used in the argument for every pair, and the double quote is used as a string delimiter for the argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果偶数的反斜杠后面是双引号,则每对参数中使用一个反斜杠,双引号作为参数的字符串定界符。

trans-unit.target: 如果要替换现有证书（请参阅剩余的天数，强制和tracking_id），则是基于request_type请求请求新证书还是更新或重新发布现有证书。

trans-unit.source: If an existing image is replaced, services using the image will be recreated unless recreate is never.
trans-unit.target: 如果现有的图像被替换，使用图像服务将被重新创建，除非重新创建是 never 。

trans-unit.source: If an image does not exist locally, it will not appear in the results. If you want to check whether an image exists locally, you can call the module with the image name, then check whether the result list is empty (image does not exist) or has one element (the image exists locally).
trans-unit.target: 如果一个图像在本地不存在,它将不会出现在结果中。如果你想检查一个图像是否在本地存在,你可以调用带有图像名称的模块,然后检查结果列表是空的(图像不存在)还是有一个元素(图像在本地存在)。

trans-unit.source: If an inventory plugin supports caching, you can enable and set caching options for an individual YAML configuration source or for multiple inventory sources using environment variables or Ansible configuration files. If you enable caching for an inventory plugin without providing inventory-specific caching options, the inventory plugin will use fact-caching options. Here is an example of enabling caching for an individual YAML configuration file:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个清单插件支持缓存,您可以使用环境变量或Ansible配置文件为单个YAML配置源或多个清单源启用和设置缓存选项。如果你为一个清单插件启用缓存而不提供清单特定的缓存选项,清单插件将使用事实缓存选项。下面是一个为单个YAML配置文件启用缓存的例子。

trans-unit.source: If an md5 hash is used, the digest flag must be set to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用md5哈希,则必须将digest标志设置为true。

trans-unit.source: If an odd number of backslashes is followed by a double quote, one backslash is used in the argument for every pair, and the double quote is escaped and made a literal double quote in the argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果奇数个反斜杠后面是双引号,则在参数中每对一个反斜杠,双引号就会被转义,并在参数中成为一个字面的双引号。

trans-unit.source: If an unsupported value is requested, the error message will list the supported values for the caller's project.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求了一个不支持的值,错误信息将列出调用者项目的支持值。

trans-unit.source: If an wiki for this project should be available or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个项目的wiki应该有或没有。

trans-unit.source: If any changes have been made to the Internet Gateway.
trans-unit.target: 如果对互联网网关进行了任何更改。

trans-unit.source: If any of the files altered in the commit pass the ignoredFiles filter and includedFiles is empty, then as far as this filter is concerned, we should trigger the build.
trans-unit.target: 如果提交中修改的文件中有任何文件通过了ignoredFiles过滤器,并且includeFiles为空,那么就这个过滤器而言,我们应该触发构建。

trans-unit.source: If any of the files altered in the commit pass the ignoredFiles filter and includedFiles is not empty, then we make sure that at least one of those files matches a includedFiles glob. If not, then we do not trigger a build.
trans-unit.target: 如果提交中修改的文件通过了 ignoredFiles 过滤器,并且 includedFiles 不是空的,那么我们要确保其中至少有一个文件符合 includedFiles glob。如果不匹配,我们就不触发构建。

trans-unit.source: If any of the images fail to be pushed, the build status is marked FAILURE.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何一个镜像没有被推送,构建状态就会被标记为FAILURE。

trans-unit.source: If any of the parameters passed to the module are sensitive in nature, and you do not trust the client machines, then this is a potential danger.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递给模块的任何参数都是敏感的,你不信任客户机,那么这就是一个潜在的危险。

trans-unit.source: If any of the specified servers are unavailable, the current virtual server is also listed as unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何指定的服务器不可用,当前的虚拟服务器也会被列为不可用。

trans-unit.source: If anything changed on VM's extraConfig.
trans-unit.target: 如果虚拟机的extraConfig有什么变化。

trans-unit.source: If application/json is specified in content_type, json will be loaded into variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果在content_type中指定了application/json,json将被加载到变量中。

trans-unit.source: If at the end of any allocation attempt the guest is not assigned to at least this many slots, the attempt fails and the change that initiated it is reverted.
trans-unit.target: 如果在任何分配尝试结束时,客人没有被分配到至少这么多的槽位,那么尝试就会失败,启动它的变化就会被还原。

trans-unit.source: If authentication is required, use the format "username:password@host:port".
trans-unit.target: 如果需要认证,请使用 "用户名:密码@主机:端口 "的格式。

trans-unit.source: If auto_allocate_floating_ip is true and more than one floating-ip subnets exist, then the subnet for the floating ip address allocation.
trans-unit.target: 如果auto_allocate_floating_ip为true,且存在多个floating-ip子网,则为floating ip地址分配的子网。

trans-unit.source: If available memory falls below this limit, the system marks the server as unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 如果可用内存低于这个限制,系统会将服务器标记为不可用。

trans-unit.source: If become or CredSSP is not available, the username and password options can be used for the initial authentication but these are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 如果变为或CredSSP不可用，则可以将用户名和密码选项用于初始身份验证，但这些名称不会保留。

trans-unit.target: 如果使用become或CredSSP,任何用win_credential保存的凭证都会被自动使用。

trans-unit.source: If behind NAT and need to know the public IP of your internet gateway.
trans-unit.target: 如果在NAT后面,需要知道你的互联网网关的公共IP。

trans-unit.target: 如果启动协议是静态的,将此IP地址设置为虚拟机的网络接口。

trans-unit.source: If boot protocol is static, set this gateway to network interface of Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果启动协议是静态的,将此网关设置为虚拟机的网络接口。

trans-unit.source: If boot protocol is static, set this netmask to network interface of Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果启动协议是静态的,则将此网罩设置为虚拟机的网络接口。

trans-unit.source: If both keys_send and string_send are specified, keys in keys_send list will be sent in front of the string_send.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个 keys_send 和 string_send 指定，在键 keys_send 名单将在前方发 string_send 。

trans-unit.target: 如果两个CSR和OU被指定，在该值OU将覆盖OU字段存在于主题中的专有名称CSR

trans-unit.target: 如果同时指定了zone和zone_id，则将使用zone_id。

trans-unit.source: If both the cryptography and PyOpenSSL libraries are available (and meet the minimum version requirements) cryptography will be preferred as a backend over PyOpenSSL (unless the backend is forced with select_crypto_backend). Please note that the PyOpenSSL backend was deprecated in Ansible 2.9 and will be removed in Ansible 2.13.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码库和PyOpenSSL库均可用（并且满足最低版本要求），则密码学将比PyOpenSSL首选作为后端（除非使用 select_crypto_backend 强制后端）。请注意，PyOpenSSL后端已在Ansible 2.9中弃用，并将在Ansible 2.13中删除。

trans-unit.target: 如果退回通知未传递到SNS主题，则必须启用feedback_forwarding。

trans-unit.target: 如果正在根分区中创建砖块,模块将失败。将force设置为true,以覆盖此行为。

trans-unit.target: 如果指定了catchall目标，即IPv4 :: 0.0.0.0 :: IPv6，则mask参数分别设置为 any 或 any6 。

trans-unit.target: 如果更改失败。

trans-unit.source: If cluster isn't specified it's valid to all clusters in system:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定集群,则对系统中的所有集群有效。

trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 cluster_name,指定的服务将在属于该集群的所有 ESXi 主机上进行管理。

trans-unit.source: If clustering is enabled, the id of the shard to be rebooted.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了集群,则是要重启的shard的id。

trans-unit.source: If column privileges are used, the priv1,priv2 part must be exactly as returned by a SHOW GRANT statement. If not followed, the module will always report changes. It includes grouping columns by permission (SELECT(col1,col2) instead of SELECT(col1,SELECT(col2))).
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了列特权，则 priv1,priv2 部分必须与 SHOW GRANT 语句返回的完全相同。如果不遵循，该模块将始终报告更改。它包括按权限对列进行分组（ SELECT(col1,col2 ）而不是 SELECT(col1 ，SELECT（col2）））。

trans-unit.source: If complaint notifications are not delivered to a SNS topic, feedback_forwarding must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果投诉通知未传递到SNS主题，则必须启用feedback_forwarding。

trans-unit.source: If configuration needs to be added/updated
trans-unit.target: 如果需要添加/更新配置。

trans-unit.target: 如果配置了,那么avi将触发协调池服务器的创建和删除。

trans-unit.source: If connection to Tower works
trans-unit.target: 如果连接到塔台工作

trans-unit.target: 如果createOption是Import,则是要导入到托管磁盘的blob的URI。

trans-unit.source: If creating snippets should be available or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建片段应该可以使用或不使用。

trans-unit.target: 如果要使用容器化数据导入器将数据复制到PVC上,您可以指定数据的来源(以及任何附加配置)以及它的格式。

trans-unit.source: If default vhost is required, use '%2F'.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要默认的虚拟主机，请使用 '%2F' 。

trans-unit.source: If desired, the above techniques may be extended to enable continuous deployment practices.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要,可以扩展上述技术,以实现连续部署做法。

trans-unit.source: If desired, you can also attach existing non-root persistent disks using this property. This field is only applicable for persistent disks.

trans-unit.source: If destination is a directory, the module uses a filename from 'Content-Disposition' header specified by the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标是目录,模块使用服务器指定的'Content-Disposition'头的文件名。

trans-unit.source: If destination ranges are specified, the firewall will apply only to traffic that has destination IP address in these ranges. These ranges must be expressed in CIDR format. Only IPv4 is supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了目标范围,防火墙将只适用于目标 IP 地址在这些范围内的流量。这些范围必须以CIDR格式表示。仅支持IPv4。

trans-unit.source: If disabled, avi will not send the sni extension as part of the handshake.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用,avi将不会发送sni扩展名作为握手的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If no cluster size is specified when you format a partition, defaults are selected based on the size of the partition.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式化分区时没有指定群集大小,则会根据分区的大小选择默认值。

trans-unit.source: If no comment is specified, the existing comment will be kept.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定评论,将保留现有的评论。

trans-unit.source: If no credentials are provided and the control node has an associated IAM instance profile then the role will be used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供凭证,而控制节点有关联的IAM实例配置文件,那么将使用该角色进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If no default is set, it will result in an error if any of the variables is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置默认值,如果任何一个变量未定义,将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: If no existing certificate exists, can be used to set-up https in the first place if that is needed for providing the challenge.
trans-unit.target: 如果现有证书不存在,如果需要提供挑战,可以先用它来设置https。

trans-unit.source: If no key was found and no public key was provided and a new SSH private/public key pair will be created and the private key will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有找到密钥,也没有提供公钥,将创建一个新的SSH私钥/公钥对,并返回私钥。

trans-unit.source: If no license type is specified then default license enforcement for the cloud type is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定许可证类型,则会选择云类型的默认许可证执行。

trans-unit.source: If no mask is provided, the value any6 is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供掩码，则使用值 any6 。

trans-unit.source: If no name is specified a default container named 'vhds' will created.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定名称,将创建一个名为'vhds'的默认容器。

trans-unit.source: If no package is specified, clean up the world's dependencies
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定包,则清理世界上的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: If no passphrase is provided, the SSH key will default to having no passphrase.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供密码,SSH 密钥将默认为没有密码。

trans-unit.source: If no play level tags are set, the “Gathering Facts” task will be given a tag of always and will effectively match prior behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置任何播放级别标签，则“收集事实”任务将被赋予 always 标签，并将有效地匹配先前的行为。

trans-unit.source: If no port number is specified, the default port 49163 is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定端口号，则使用默认端口 49163 。

trans-unit.source: If no scheme is specified in hostname, module defaults to http:// because https:// is problematic in most setups. Make sure you are accessing XenServer host in trusted environment or use https:// scheme explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 hostname 中未指定任何方案，则模块默认为 http:// ,因为在大多数设置中 https:// 是有问题的。确保您在受信任的环境中访问XenServer主机，或明确使用 https:// 方案。

trans-unit.source: If no sourcePort is defined, it assumes all of them.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有定义sourcePort,则假设所有的sourcePort。

trans-unit.source: If no subnet, ENI, or availability zone is provided, the default subnet in the default VPC will be used in the first AZ (alphabetically sorted).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供子网、ENI或可用性区,默认VPC中的默认子网将被用于第一个AZ(按字母排序)。

trans-unit.source: If no such record exists, a new one will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在这样的记录,将创建一个新的记录。

trans-unit.source: If no targetTags are specified, the firewall rule applies to all instances on the specified network.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定 targetTags,则防火墙规则适用于指定网络上的所有实例。

trans-unit.source: If no user is supplied, Ansible will let the ssh client binary choose the user as it normally
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供用户,Ansible会让ssh客户端二进制选择用户,就像通常情况下那样

trans-unit.source: If no value is passed, default value is set by oVirt/RHV engine.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有传递值,默认值由oVirt/RHV引擎设置。

trans-unit.source: If no value is provided, any existing value will be removed on an existing public IP.

trans-unit.source: If no value is provided, the system derived prefix will be used (equivalent to selecting 'derived' option in UI).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供值,将使用系统派生前缀(相当于在用户界面中选择 "派生 "选项)。

trans-unit.source: If no value is set all tables are targeted.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置值,则所有表都是目标表。

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified an ephemeral port is chosen for the connection being created.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定数值,则会为正在创建的连接选择一个短暂的端口。

trans-unit.source: If no value is specified, avi will use the incoming host header instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定值,avi将使用传入的主机头代替。

trans-unit.source: If no value provided, the default security group or current security group will be used
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供任何值,将使用默认安全组或当前安全组。

trans-unit.source: If no value specified, the volume is assigned snapshot only by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定数值,则默认情况下,该卷只分配快照。

trans-unit.source: If no virtualservices are provided, avi vantage will provide dns services for configured applications.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供virtualservices,avi vantage将为配置的应用程序提供dns服务。

trans-unit.source: If no vrf is supplied, vrf is set to default.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供vrf,则将vrf设置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: If noauth mode is utilized, this is required to be set to the endpoint URL for the Ironic API. Use with "auth" and "auth_type" settings set to None.
trans-unit.target: 如果利用了noauth模式,则需要将其设置为Ironic API的端点URL。在 "auth "和 "auth_type "设置为None的情况下使用。

trans-unit.source: If non-zero, the oldest snapshot image will be automatically deleted when creating a new snapshot image to keep the total number of snapshot images limited to the number specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果不为零,则在创建新的快照图像时,将自动删除最旧的快照图像,以使快照图像的总数限制在指定的数量内。

trans-unit.source: If none of these are specified, the default will be to autoscale based on cpuUtilization to 0.6 or 60%.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定这些内容,默认将根据cpuUtilization自动缩放到0.6或60%。

trans-unit.source: If not 0, the module will wait for this task id to be completed. Use wait_task_completion if you want to wait for completion of a previously executed task with wait_completion=false. You can execute this module repeatedly on a list of failover IPs using wait_completion=false (see examples)
trans-unit.target: 如果不是0,模块将等待这个任务id的完成。如果你想在wait_completion=false的情况下等待之前执行的任务完成,请使用wait_task_completion。你可以使用wait_completion=false在故障转移IP列表上重复执行这个模块(见例子)。

trans-unit.source: If not create_mode=default, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是create_mode = default，那么将忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, name will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义，将使用 name 。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, the OS disk will be created with virtual hard disk (VHD).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有定义,操作系统磁盘将用虚拟硬盘(VHD)创建。

trans-unit.source: If not download screenshot file to local machine, you can open it through the returned file URL in screenshot facts manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有下载截图文件到本地机器,可以通过截图事实中返回的文件网址手动打开。

trans-unit.source: If not given, the CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT env variable is considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出，则考虑 CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT 环境变量。

trans-unit.source: If not given, the CLOUDSTACK_KEY env variable is considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出，则考虑 CLOUDSTACK_KEY env变量。

trans-unit.source: If not given, the CLOUDSTACK_METHOD env variable is considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出，则考虑 CLOUDSTACK_METHOD 环境变量。

trans-unit.source: If not given, the CLOUDSTACK_REGION env variable is considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出，则考虑 CLOUDSTACK_REGION 环境变量。

trans-unit.source: If not given, the CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT env variable is considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出，则考虑 CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT 环境变量。

trans-unit.source: If not informed reducing (absent state) the volume group will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未通知减少（ absent 状态），则将删除该卷组。

trans-unit.source: If not mentioned a new logical volume name will be created following AIX standards (LVM).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提及,将按照AIX标准(LVM)创建新的逻辑卷名。

trans-unit.source: If not present during the subscriptions.create call, it will default to the version of the API used to make such call. If not present during a subscriptions.modifyPushConfig call, its value will not be changed. subscriptions.get calls will always return a valid version, even if the subscription was created without this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果在subscriptions.create调用期间不存在,它将默认为用于进行此类调用的API的版本。如果在subscriptions.modifyPushConfig调用中不存在,它的值将不会被更改。subscriptions.get调用将始终返回一个有效的版本,即使订阅是在没有此属性的情况下创建的。

trans-unit.source: If not provided the ID will be automatically assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供ID,将自动分配。

trans-unit.source: If not provided then all interface types will be considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供,那么将考虑所有接口类型。

trans-unit.target: 如果未提供，则使用 http:// 和参数名称作为url。

trans-unit.source: If not set to any of above, then information are gathered related to all images.

trans-unit.source: If not set, the table is partitioned by pseudo column, referenced via either '_PARTITIONTIME' as TIMESTAMP type, or '_PARTITIONDATE' as DATE type. trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置,则表通过伪列进行分区,通过'_PARTITIONTIME'作为TIMESTAMP类型,或'_PARTITIONDATE'作为DATE类型进行引用。如果指定了字段,表就会被这个字段代替分区。该字段必须是顶级的TIMESTAMP或DATE字段。其模式必须是NULLABLE或REQUIRED。

trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则使用全局配置vm.deployment.planner的值。

trans-unit.source: If path is a directory and ends with "/", only the inside contents of that directory are copied to the destination. Otherwise, if it does not end with "/", the directory itself with all contents is copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果path是一个目录,并且以"/"结尾,则只将该目录内部的内容复制到目的地。否则,如果它不以"/"结尾,则复制目录本身和所有内容。

trans-unit.source: If path is a directory, it is copied (including the source folder name) recursively to dest.
trans-unit.target: 如果path是目录，则将其（包括源文件夹名称）递归复制到 dest 。

trans-unit.source: If path is a directory, it is copied recursively. In this case, if path ends with "/", only inside contents of that directory are copied to destination. Otherwise, if it does not end with "/", the directory itself with all contents is copied. This behavior is similar to the rsync command line tool.
trans-unit.target: 如果path是目录，则以递归方式复制它。在这种情况下，如果路径以“ /”结尾，则仅将该目录的内部内容复制到目标。否则，如果它不以“ /”结尾，则将复制具有所有内容的目录本身。此行为类似于 rsync 命令行工具。

trans-unit.source: If path is a file and dest ends with "\", the file is copied to the folder with the same filename.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径是一个文件,并且dest以"\"结尾,则该文件将被复制到具有相同文件名的文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: If path is not specified default system temporary directory (%TEMP%) will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定路径,将使用默认的系统临时目录(%TEMP%)。

trans-unit.source: If path is not specified, the default system temporary directory will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定路径,将使用默认的系统临时目录。

trans-unit.source: If positive, maxRetryDuration specifies the time limit for retrying a failed task, measured from when the task was first attempted. Once maxRetryDuration time has passed and the task has been attempted maxAttempts times, no further attempts will be made and the task will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果为正值,maxRetryDuration指定了重试失败任务的时间限制,从任务首次尝试开始计算。一旦过了maxRetryDuration时间,并且任务已经被尝试了maxAttempts次,就不会再进行尝试,任务将被删除。

trans-unit.target: 如果前面有^字符,序列将是一个控制字符。如果seq设置为0或1,则使用。

trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则将id用作密钥。

trans-unit.source: If provided, it must be a different zone from the one provided in [locationId].

trans-unit.source: If proxy support is not needed, but the system may have it configured nevertheless, use the parameter use_proxy: no to avoid accidental system proxy usage.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要代理支持，但是系统仍然可以对其进行配置，请使用参数 use_proxy: no 以避免意外使用系统代理。

trans-unit.source: If push delivery is used with this subscription, this field is used to configure it. An empty pushConfig signifies that the subscriber will pull and ack messages using API methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果此订阅使用推送,则此字段用于配置它。空的pushConfig表示订阅者将使用API方法拉取和回避消息。

trans-unit.source: If reading configurations from environment variables, the path in the command must be @tower_inventory.
trans-unit.target: 如果从环境变量读取配置,命令中的路径必须是@tower_inventory。

trans-unit.source: If reading from the YAML file, the file name must end with tower.(yml|yaml) or tower_inventory.(yml|yaml), the path in the command would be /path/to/tower_inventory.(yml|yaml). If some arguments in the config file are missing, this plugin will try to fill in missing arguments by reading from environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果从YAML文件中读取,文件名必须以tower.(yml|yaml)或tower_inventory.(yml|yaml)结尾,命令中的路径为/path/to/tower_inventory.(yml|yaml)。如果配置文件中的某些参数缺失,这个插件会尝试通过读取环境变量来填补缺失的参数。

trans-unit.source: If record_value is not specified; no changes will be made and the record will be returned in 'result' (in other words, this module can be used to fetch a record's current id, type, and ttl)
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定record_value,则不会进行任何修改,记录将以'result'的形式返回(换句话说,这个模块可以用来获取记录的当前id、类型和ttl)。

trans-unit.source: If regular expressions are passed to both regexp and insertafter, insertafter is only honored if no match for regexp is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果将正则表达式同时传递给 regexp 和 insertafter ，则仅在找不到与 regexp 匹配的情况下才使用 insertafter 。

trans-unit.source: If regular expressions are passed to both regexp and insertbefore, insertbefore is only honored if no match for regexp is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果将正则表达式同时传递给 regexp 和 insertbefore ，则仅在找不到与 regexp 匹配的情况下才使用 insertbefore 。

trans-unit.source: If remote gateways can be used on this virtual network.
trans-unit.target: 如果远程网关可以在这个虚拟网络上使用。

trans-unit.source: If restart is set to true with other params set, the restart will happen last, i.e. after the configuration takes place.
trans-unit.target: 如果在设置了其他参数的情况下将重启设置为 "true",则重启将在最后进行,即在配置发生后进行。

trans-unit.source: If restart is set to true with other params set, the restart will happen last, i.e. after the configuration takes place. However, ‘restart’ itself is not idempotent as it is an action and not configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果在设置了其他参数的情况下将重新启动设置为true，则重新启动将在最后一次（即在配置完成之后）发生。但是，“重新启动”本身不是幂等的，因为它是操作而不是配置。

trans-unit.source: If role(s) exists, always returns changed True.
trans-unit.target: 如果角色存在,总是返回改变后的True。

trans-unit.source: If roles/x/defaults/main.yml exists, variables listed therein will be added to the play.
trans-unit.target: 如果 roles/x/defaults/main.yml 存在,其中列出的变量将被添加到剧本中。

trans-unit.source: If roles/x/handlers/main.yml exists, handlers listed therein will be added to the play.
trans-unit.target: 如果 roles/x/handlers/main.yml 存在,其中列出的处理程序将被添加到剧本中。

trans-unit.source: If roles/x/meta/main.yml exists, any role dependencies listed therein will be added to the list of roles (1.3 and later).
trans-unit.target: 如果 roles/x/meta/main.yml 存在,其中列出的任何角色依赖关系都会被添加到角色列表中(1.3 及更新版本)。

trans-unit.source: If roles/x/tasks/main.yml exists, tasks listed therein will be added to the play.
trans-unit.target: 如果 roles/x/tasks/main.yml 存在,其中列出的任务将被添加到剧中。

trans-unit.source: If roles/x/vars/main.yml exists, variables listed therein will be added to the play.
trans-unit.target: 如果 roles/x/vars/main.yml 存在,其中列出的变量将被添加到剧本中。

trans-unit.source: If rule_index is not provided, client_match is used as a key to fetch current rule to determine create,delete,modify actions. If a rule with provided client_match exists, a new rule will not be created, but the existing rule will be modified or deleted. If a rule with provided client_match doesn't exist, a new rule will be created if state is present.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供rule_index,则使用client_match作为键来获取当前规则,以决定创建、删除、修改动作。如果提供了client_match的规则存在,则不会创建新的规则,但会修改或删除现有的规则。如果一个提供client_match的规则不存在,如果状态存在,则会创建一个新的规则。

trans-unit.source: If running in a domain environment, some of these options are set by GPO and cannot be changed on the host itself. When a key has been configured with GPO, it contains the text [Source="GPO"] next to the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果在域环境中运行，则某些选项由GPO设置，并且不能在主机本身上更改。使用GPO配置了密钥后，该密钥在该值旁边包含文本 [Source="GPO"] 。

trans-unit.source: If running on Server 2008 the hotfix https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/2556308/tzutil-command-line-tool-is-added-to-windows-vista-and-to-windows-server-2008 needs to be installed to be able to run this module.
trans-unit.target: 如果在Server 2008上运行，则修补程序https://support.microsoft.com/zh-cn/help/2556308/tzutil-command-line-tool-is-added-to-windows-vista-and-to-windows-server需要安装-2008才能运行此模块。

trans-unit.source: If running on Server 2008, then SP2 must be installed. If running on Server 2008 R2 or Windows 7, then SP1 must be installed.
trans-unit.target: 在Server 2008上运行时,必须安装SP2。如果在Server 2008 R2或Windows 7上运行,则必须安装SP1。

trans-unit.source: If running on a server that is not a Domain Controller, credential delegation through CredSSP or Kerberos with delegation must be used or the domain_username, domain_password must be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果在不是域控制器的服务器上运行，则必须使用通过CredSSP或Kerberos进行委派的凭据委派，或者必须设置domain_username，domain_password。

trans-unit.source: If running on a version of Ansible that is older than 2.5 or the normal runas escalation process fails, an elevated token can be retrieved by:

trans-unit.source: If running over HTTP and not HTTPS, use ntlm, kerberos or credssp with ansible_winrm_message_encryption: auto to enable message encryption. If using another authentication option or if the installed pywinrm version cannot be upgraded, the Service\AllowUnencrypted can be set to true but this is only recommended for troubleshooting
trans-unit.target: 如果通过HTTP而不是HTTPS运行，请使用 ntlm ， kerberos 或 credssp 以及 ansible_winrm_message_encryption: auto 启用消息加密。如果使用其他身份验证选项，或者无法升级已安装的pywinrm版本，则可以将 Service\AllowUnencrypted 设置为 true ,但这仅建议用于故障排除

trans-unit.source: If running this module with a non admin user, the logon rights will be an empty list as Administrator rights are required to query LSA for the information.
trans-unit.target: 如果用非管理员用户运行该模块,登录权限将是一个空列表,因为需要管理员权限来查询LSA的信息。

trans-unit.source: If safe mode is enabled for the client. Safe mode requires local check definitions in order to accept a check request and execute the check.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端启用了安全模式。安全模式需要本地检查定义才能接受检查请求并执行检查。

trans-unit.target: 如果搜索一个较大的Active Directory数据库,出于性能考虑,建议缩小search_base的范围。

trans-unit.source: If set (required for changing a value), this is the name of the option.

trans-unit.source: If set to 0 or 0s, the default action escalation period will be used.

trans-unit.source: If set to 0 the command will be run on the current host.

trans-unit.source: If set to 0, no limit is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为0,则不适用限制。

trans-unit.source: If set to 'infinity', user's password never expire.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 'infinity' ，则用户密码永不过期。

trans-unit.source: If set to -1, and service is not present, service replicas will be set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 -1 且不存在服务，则服务副本将设置为 1 。

trans-unit.source: If set to -1, and service is present, service replicas will be unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 -1 ，并且存在服务，则服务副本将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: If set to -1, the number of connections is unlimited.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 -1 ，则连接数不受限制。

trans-unit.source: If set to 0 or follow_redirects is set to none, or safe when not doing a GET or HEAD it prevents all redirection.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 0 或follow_redirects设置为 none ，或者在不执行 GET 或 HEAD 时 safe ，则它将阻止所有重定向。

trans-unit.source: If set to 0, no new connections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 0 ，则不允许新连接。

trans-unit.source: If set to False then prevents the role from being removed if any permissions are using it.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 False ,则防止在使用任何权限的情况下删除角色。

trans-unit.source: If set to False, the DRS rule will be an Anti-Affinity rule.

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 False ，则不会验证SSL证书。

trans-unit.source: If set to False, the virtual machine waits indefinitely for user intervention.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 False ，则虚拟机将无限期等待用户干预。

trans-unit.source: If set to False, will add, reconfigure or remove network adapters according to the parameters in networks.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 False ，将根据添加参数，重新配置或删除网络适配器 networks 。

trans-unit.source: If set to True, and state is present, an existing object will be replaced.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, evacuate all powered off VMs.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, module will wait for process to complete in the given virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, overrides drs_default_vm_behavior.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, return settings of all network adapters, other parameters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 True ，则返回所有网络适配器的设置，其他参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If set to True, the DRS rule will be an Affinity rule.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, the DRS rule will be enabled.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, the DRS rule will be mandatory.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, the virtual machine automatically enters BIOS setup the next time it boots.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, the virtual machine that fails to boot, will try to boot again after boot_retry_delay is expired.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, then the host should be connected as soon as it is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 True ，则主机应在添加后立即连接。

trans-unit.source: If set to absent and category does not exists, no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为“ absent 并且类别不存在，则不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 absent 并且类别存在，则类别被删除。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 absent 和标签不存在，不采取行动。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 absent 并且标签存在，则标签被删除。

trans-unit.source: If set to all, disables all excludes.

trans-unit.source: If set to all, then information are gathered for all virtual machines and virtual machine templates.

trans-unit.source: If set to automatic, selects the appropriate option (software or hardware) for this virtual machine automatically.

trans-unit.source: If set to datastore, then 'Storage Folder' is created under datacenter.

trans-unit.source: If set to disabled, HA does not restart virtual machines after a host fails.

trans-unit.source: If set to disabled, then HA is disabled for this virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: If set to fullyAutomated, then vCenter should automate both the migration of virtual machines and their placement with a host at power on.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 fullyAutomated ，则vCenter应该在开机时通过主机自动实现虚拟机的迁移及其放置。

trans-unit.source: If set to hardware, requires graphics hardware (GPU) for faster 3D calculations.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 hardware ，则需要图形硬件（GPU）进行更快的3D计算。

trans-unit.source: If set to high, then virtual machine with this priority have a higher chance of powering on after a failure, when there is insufficient capacity on hosts to meet all virtual machine needs.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 high ，则当主机上的容量不足以满足所有虚拟机需求时，具有此优先级的虚拟机更有可能在发生故障后重新启动。

trans-unit.source: If set to list will query the given parameter specified by key. Returns 'null' is nothing found or mis-spelled.

trans-unit.source: If set to low, then virtual machine with this priority have a lower chance of powering on after a failure, when there is insufficient capacity on hosts to meet all virtual machine needs.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 low ，则当主机上的容量不足以满足所有虚拟机需求时，具有此优先级的虚拟机出现故障后开机的机率较低。

trans-unit.source: If set to main, disable excludes defined in [main] in dnf.conf.

trans-unit.source: If set to main, disable excludes defined in [main] in yum.conf.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 main ，则禁用yum.conf中[main]中定义的排除项。

trans-unit.source: If set to manual, then vCenter generate recommendations for virtual machine migration and for the placement with a host. vCenter should not implement the recommendations automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 manual ，则vCenter会为虚拟机迁移以及与主机的放置生成建议。vCenter不应自动实施建议。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 medium ，则当主机上的容量不足以满足所有虚拟机需求时，具有此优先级的虚拟机在出现故障后有中等机会重新启动。

trans-unit.source: If set to no, terms_agreed and account_email are ignored.

trans-unit.source: If set to no, no checksuming of the content is performed which can help improve performance on larger files.

trans-unit.source: If set to no, processing of the packet is subject to the unhandled-query-action option.

trans-unit.source: If set to no, the SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only set to no used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates as it avoids verifying the source site.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 no ，那么将不会验证SSL证书。仅在使用自签名证书的个人控制站点上使用此属性时才应设置为“ no ，因为这样可以避免验证源站点。

trans-unit.source: If set to no, the file will only be transferred if the destination does not exist.

trans-unit.source: If set to none, do not power off VMs in the event of a host network isolation.

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 openssl ，将尝试使用 openssl 二进制文件。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 partiallyAutomated ，则vCenter会为虚拟机迁移以及与主机的放置生成建议。vCenter会在开机时自动实施放置。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 partiallyAutomated ，则vCenter会为虚拟机迁移以及主机放置建议生成建议，然后在开机时自动实施建议放置。

trans-unit.source: If set to partner, then accept only partner and VMware signed and certified VIBs.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 partner ，则仅接受合作伙伴以及VMware已签名和认证的VIB。

trans-unit.source: If set to pass-through, pipelined data will cause the BIG-IP to immediately switch to pass-through mode and disable the HTTP filter.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 pass-through ，流水线数据将使BIG-IP立即切换到pass-through模式并禁用HTTP筛选器。

trans-unit.source: If set to present, then the DRS rule is created if not present.

trans-unit.source: If set to present, then will do reconfiguration for the specified network adapter.

trans-unit.source: If set to present, then will set given acceptance level.

trans-unit.source: If set to vmMonitoringDisabled, virtual machine health monitoring is disabled.

trans-unit.source: If set to vmware_accepted, then accept VIBs that have been accepted by VMware.

trans-unit.source: If set to vmware_certified, then accept only VIBs that are signed and certified by VMware.

trans-unit.source: If set to volume, then information are gathered related to snapshots based on volumes only.

trans-unit.source: If set to yes Yum will download packages and metadata from this repo in parallel, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes , Yum将尽可能从此仓库并行下载软件包和元数据。

trans-unit.source: If set to yes and a proxy configuration is specified in the docker client configuration (by default $HOME/.docker/config.json), the corresponding environment variables will be set in the container being built.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes 并且在 $HOME/.docker/config.json 客户端配置中指定了代理配置（默认为$ HOME / .docker / config.json），则将在正在构建的容器中设置相应的环境变量。

trans-unit.source: If set to yes but neither physical_network or network is set CloudStack will try to add the VLAN range to the Physical Network with a Public traffic type.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ,但没有设置physical_network或network，则CloudStack将尝试使用公共流量类型将VLAN范围添加到物理网络。

trans-unit.source: If set to yes when used with home: , attempt to move the user's old home directory to the specified directory if it isn't there already and the old home exists.

trans-unit.source: If set to yes will enable HA when the cluster is created.

trans-unit.source: If set to yes yum will continue running if this repository cannot be contacted for any reason. This should be set carefully as all repos are consulted for any given command.

trans-unit.source: If set to yes, DRS will not be configured; all explicit and default DRS related configurations will be ignored.

trans-unit.source: If set to yes, and state=latest then only installs updates that have been marked bugfix related.

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ，并且 state=latest ,则仅安装已标记为与安全相关的更新。

trans-unit.source: If set to yes, and state is present, an existing object will be replaced.

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ，请确保在给定的计算机上安装了Python> = 2.7.9。

trans-unit.source: If set to yes, the extended_key_usage extension field must contain only these values.

trans-unit.source: If set to yes, the file will only be transferred if the content is different than destination.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ，则仅在内容与目的地不同时才传输文件。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ，将使用或保留最小值。如果指定的值小于文件中的值，则文件内容将替换为新值，否则内容不会被修改。

trans-unit.source: If set to yes, the module will create the directory, as well as set the owner and permissions of an existing directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ，则模块将创建目录，并设置现有目录的所有者和权限。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ，则如果未指定SAN ，则模块将使用 DNS: 前缀填充 subject_alt_name 的公用名。

trans-unit.source: If set to yes, the private zone matching the requested name within the domain will be used if there are both public and private zones. The default is to use the public zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ，则同时存在公共区域和私有区域时，将使用与域中请求的名称匹配的私有区域。默认为使用公共区域。

trans-unit.source: If set to yes, the ssh host key of the device must match a ssh key present on the host if set to no, the ssh host key of the device is not checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ，则设备的ssh主机密钥必须与主机上存在的ssh密钥相匹配；如果设置为 no ，则不检查设备的ssh主机密钥。

trans-unit.source: If set to yes, will enable DRS when the cluster is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 yes ，则在创建群集时将启用DRS。

trans-unit.source: If set to absent attempt to log out by revoking the authentication token specified in api_key.

trans-unit.source: If set to present connect to the API server using the URL specified in host and attempt to log in.

trans-unit.source: If set to False, SSL certificates will not be validated. This should only be used on personally controlled sites using self-signed certificates.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "假",SSL证书将不会被验证。这只能用于使用自签证书的个人控制网站。

trans-unit.source: If set to False, the number of display and the total video memory will be reconfigured using display_number and video_memory_mb.

trans-unit.source: If set to True destination_volume_id and source_volume_id are required.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, return settings of the video card, other attributes are ignored.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, the lookup plugin will skip the lists items that do not contain the given subkey. If False, the plugin will yield an error and complain about the missing subkey.

trans-unit.source: If set to True, the member has two physical nodes (HA pair).
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为True,则该成员有两个物理节点(HA对)。

trans-unit.source: If set to True, then it has its own IP settings.

trans-unit.source: If set to actual snapshot id, then information are gathered related to that particular snapshot only.

trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "false",将禁用vs、池和服务器指标的异常计算(以及相关规则/事件)。

trans-unit.source: If set to positive integers, then wait_for_process will honor this parameter and will exit after this timeout.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为正整数，则 wait_for_process 将接受此参数，并在此超时后退出。

trans-unit.source: If set to true it'll create the network container to be added or removed from the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "true",则会创建要从系统中添加或删除的网络容器。

trans-unit.source: If set to true module will remove any previously configured usernames on the device except the current defined set of users.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "true",模块将删除设备上除当前定义的用户集以外的任何先前配置的用户名。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, Virtual Machines deployed from the latest version of the Image Definition won't use this Image Version. type: bool
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "true",从最新版本的映像定义部署的虚拟机将不会使用此映像版本。 类型:ool

trans-unit.target: 如果设置，将 --resolve-image 选项添加到docker docker stack deploy 命令。这将使docker查询注册表以解析映像摘要和受支持的平台。如果未设置，则docker默认使用“ always”。

trans-unit.source: If set, grafana_user and grafana_password will be ignored.

trans-unit.source: If set, grafana_user and grafana_password will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，grafana_user和grafana_password将被忽略。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置,子组和主机的所有变量将被移除,并由外部源上的变量取代。如果不勾选,则会进行合并,将本地变量与外部源上的变量合并。

trans-unit.source: If set, any hosts and groups that were previously present on the external source but are now removed will be removed from the Tower inventory. Hosts and groups that were not managed by the inventory source will be promoted to the next manually created group or if there is no manually created group to promote them into, they will be left in the "all" default group for the inventory. When not checked, local child hosts and groups not found on the external source will remain untouched by the inventory update process.
trans-unit.target: 如果进行了设置,以前存在于外部源上但现在已被删除的任何主机和组都将从塔楼清单中删除。未被清单源管理的主机和组将被提升到下一个手动创建的组,如果没有手动创建的组可将其提升到,则将其留在清单的 "所有 "默认组中。不勾选时,在外部源上找不到的本地子主机和组将保持不受清单更新过程的影响。

trans-unit.source: If set, ask that system firmware uses this device beyond next boot. Be aware many systems do not honor this.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,要求系统固件在下次启动后使用该设备。请注意,许多系统不尊重这一点。

trans-unit.source: If set, backupPool must also be set. They together define the fallback behavior of the primary target pool: if the ratio of the healthy instances in the primary pool is at or below this number, traffic arriving at the load-balanced IP will be directed to the backup pool.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,还必须设置backupPool。它们共同定义了主目标池的回退行为:如果主池中健康实例的比例达到或低于这个数字,到达负载均衡IP的流量将被引导到备份池。

trans-unit.source: If set, create a backup of the pg_hba file before it is modified. The location of the backup is returned in the (backup) variable by this module.

trans-unit.target: 设置时,将返回属于该群集的DRS组的信息。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置,将返回属于该集群的数据存储的信息。

trans-unit.source: If set, information of specific datastores are returned.

trans-unit.source: If set, information of this cluster will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,将返回该集群的信息。

trans-unit.source: If set, it will help to speed up virtual machine search.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,将有助于加快虚拟机搜索速度。

trans-unit.source: If set, manages a crontab's environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则管理crontab的环境变量。

trans-unit.source: If set, request UEFI boot explicitly. Strictly speaking, the spec suggests that if not set, the system should BIOS boot and offers no "don't care" option. In practice, this flag not being set does not preclude UEFI boot on any system I've encountered.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,明确要求UEFI启动。严格来说,规范建议,如果不设置,系统应该BIOS启动,并没有提供 "don't care "选项。实际上,这个标志不设置,在我遇到的任何系统上都不会排除UEFI启动。

trans-unit.source: If set, then overrides customization parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则覆盖 customization 参数值。

trans-unit.source: If set, then sets variable value to this
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则将变量值设置为这个

trans-unit.source: If set, this module will wait for the PVC to become bound and CDI (if enabled) to finish its operation before returning.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,该模块将等待PVC成为绑定和CDI(如果启用)完成其操作后再返回。

trans-unit.source: If set, this will override the Ansible default ssh arguments. In particular, users may wish to raise the ControlPersist time to encourage performance. A value of 30 minutes may be appropriate. Be aware that if -o ControlPath is set in ssh_args, the control path setting is not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，它将覆盖Ansible默认ssh参数。特别是，用户可能希望增加ControlPersist时间来鼓励性能。30分钟的值可能是合适的。请注意，如果在ssh_args中设置了 -o ControlPath ，则不会使用控制路径设置。

trans-unit.source: If set, this will override the Ansible default ssh arguments.In particular, users may wish to raise the ControlPersist time to encourage performance. A value of 30 minutes may be appropriate.Be aware that if -o ControlPath is set in ssh_args, the control path setting is not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，它将覆盖Ansible默认的ssh参数，尤其是用户可能希望增加ControlPersist时间来鼓励性能。30分钟的值可能合适。请注意，如果在ssh_args中设置了 -o ControlPath ，则不会使用控制路径设置。

trans-unit.source: If set, virtual services will be automatically migrated when load on an se is less than minimum or more than maximum thresholds.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了,当某一服务的负载小于最小值或大于最大值时,虚拟服务将被自动迁移。

trans-unit.source: If set, virtual services will be placed on only a subset of the cores of an se.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,虚拟服务将只被放置在一个se的核心子集上。

trans-unit.source: If set, we search by checksum instead of name.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了,我们将通过校验和而不是名称进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: If set, will always result in a change unless update_password is set to no and no other changes are required for the service.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，将始终导致更改，除非将 update_password 设置为 no 并且该服务不需要其他更改。

trans-unit.source: If set, will automatically set boot_retry_enabled to True as this parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，将自动将 boot_retry_enabled 设置为 True ,因为此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: If set, will be used instead of the name to locate the alert.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,将代替名称来定位警报。

trans-unit.source: If setting a dict, the keys should be the protocol and the values should be the hostname and/or port for that protocol.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置一个dict,键应该是协议,值应该是该协议的主机名和/或端口。

trans-unit.source: If setting a string, should be in the form hostname, hostname:port, or protocol=hostname:port.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置字符串，则格式应为 hostname ， hostname:port 或 protocol=hostname:port 。

trans-unit.source: If snapshot_id is used, region and block_size will be ignored and changed to null.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了snapshot_id,区域和block_size将被忽略并改为null。

trans-unit.source: If sni server name is specified, rewrite incoming host header to the sni server name.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了sni服务器名称,则将传入的主机头重写为sni服务器名称。

trans-unit.source: If something feels complicated, it probably is, and may be a good opportunity to simplify things.
trans-unit.target: 如果觉得某件事情很复杂,很可能就是这样,可能是简化事情的好机会。

trans-unit.source: If source package name is not available then fact is populated as null.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有源软件包名称,那么事实将被填充为空。

trans-unit.source: If source ranges are specified, the firewall will apply only to traffic that has source IP address in these ranges. These ranges must be expressed in CIDR format. One or both of sourceRanges and sourceTags may be set. If both properties are set, the firewall will apply to traffic that has source IP address within sourceRanges OR the source IP that belongs to a tag listed in the sourceTags property. The connection does not need to match both properties for the firewall to apply. Only IPv4 is supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了源范围,防火墙将只适用于源 IP 地址在这些范围内的流量。这些范围必须以 CIDR 格式表示。可以设置 sourceRanges 和 sourceTags 中的一个或两个。如果同时设置了这两个属性,防火墙将应用于源 IP 地址在 sourceRanges 内或源 IP 属于 sourceTags 属性中列出的标记的流量。连接不需要同时匹配这两个属性,防火墙就可以应用。仅支持 IPv4。

trans-unit.source: If source service accounts are specified, the firewall will apply only to traffic originating from an instance with a service account in this list. Source service accounts cannot be used to control traffic to an instance's external IP address because service accounts are associated with an instance, not an IP address. sourceRanges can be set at the same time as sourceServiceAccounts. If both are set, the firewall will apply to traffic that has source IP address within sourceRanges OR the source IP belongs to an instance with service account listed in sourceServiceAccount. The connection does not need to match both properties for the firewall to apply. sourceServiceAccounts cannot be used at the same time as sourceTags or targetTags.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了源服务账户,防火墙将只适用于来自具有该列表中服务账户的实例的流量。源服务帐户不能用于控制指向实例外部 IP 地址的流量,因为服务帐户与实例相关联,而不是与 IP 地址相关联。sourceRanges 可以与 sourceServiceAccounts 同时设置。如果两者都设置了,防火墙将适用于源IP地址在sourceRanges内的流量,或者源IP属于sourceServiceAccount中列出的服务账户的实例。连接不需要同时符合这两个属性,防火墙就能应用。sourceServiceAccounts不能与sourceTags或targetTags同时使用。

trans-unit.source: If source tags are specified, the firewall will apply only to traffic with source IP that belongs to a tag listed in source tags. Source tags cannot be used to control traffic to an instance's external IP address. Because tags are associated with an instance, not an IP address. One or both of sourceRanges and sourceTags may be set. If both properties are set, the firewall will apply to traffic that has source IP address within sourceRanges OR the source IP that belongs to a tag listed in the sourceTags property. The connection does not need to match both properties for the firewall to apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了源标签,防火墙将仅适用于源 IP 属于源标签中所列标签的流量。源标签不能用于控制指向实例外部 IP 地址的流量。因为标签与实例相关联,而不是与 IP 地址相关联。可以设置sourceRanges和sourceTags中的一个或两个。如果设置了这两个属性,防火墙将适用于源 IP 地址在 sourceRanges 内或源 IP 属于 sourceTags 属性中列出的标记的流量。连接不需要同时符合这两个属性,防火墙就可以应用。

trans-unit.source: If source type is blob URI, the source should be the full URI of the blob in string type.
trans-unit.target: 如果源类型是blob URI,那么源应该是字符串类型的blob的完整URI。

trans-unit.source: If stack already exists create a changeset instead of directly applying changes. See the AWS Change Sets docs https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/using-cfn-updating-stacks-changesets.html. WARNING: if the stack does not exist, it will be created without changeset. If the state is absent, the stack will be deleted immediately with no changeset.
trans-unit.target: 如果堆栈已经存在，则创建一个变更集，而不是直接应用变更。请参阅AWS变更集docs https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/using-cfn-updating-stacks-changesets.html。警告：如果堆栈不存在，则将在不进行更改集的情况下创建堆栈。如果状态不存在，则将立即删除堆栈，而不会进行任何更改。

trans-unit.source: If state is "present", stack will be created. If state is "present" and if stack exists and template has changed, it will be updated. If state is "absent", stack will be removed.

trans-unit.source: If supplied, restrict the additional facts collected to the given subset. Possible values: all, min, hardware, network, virtual, ohai, and facter. Can specify a list of values to specify a larger subset. Values can also be used with an initial ! to specify that that specific subset should not be collected. For instance: !hardware,!network,!virtual,!ohai,!facter. If !all is specified then only the min subset is collected. To avoid collecting even the min subset, specify !all,!min. To collect only specific facts, use !all,!min, and specify the particular fact subsets. Use the filter parameter if you do not want to display some collected facts.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则将收集的其他事实限制为给定的子集。可能的值： all ， min ， hardware ， network ， virtual ， ohai 和 facter 。可以指定值列表以指定更大的子集。值也可以与首字母 ! 指定不应收集该特定子集。例如： !hardware,!network,!virtual,!ohai,!facter 。如果指定 !all ，则仅收集最小子集。为了避免甚至收集min子集，请指定 !all,!min 。要仅收集特定事实，请使用 !all,!min ，并指定特定的事实子集。如果您不想显示一些收集的事实，请使用filter参数。

trans-unit.source: If the replace argument is set to yes, it will replace the entire running-config of the device with the config argument value. For devices that support replacing running configuration from file on device like NXOS/JUNOS, the replace argument takes path to the file on the device that will be used for replacing the entire running-config. The value of config option should be None for such devices. Nexus 9K devices only support replace. Use net_put or nxos_file_copy in case of NXOS module to copy the flat file to remote device and then use set the fullpath to this argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果 replace 参数设置为 yes ，它将使用 config 参数值替换设备的整个running-config 。对于支持从NXOS / JUNOS之类的设备上的文件替换运行配置的设备， replace 参数采用设备上用于替换整个running-config的文件的路径。对于此类设备， config 选项的值应为None。 Nexus 9K设备仅支持替换。如果是NXOS模块，请使用net_put或nxos_file_copy将平面文件复制到远程设备，然后将全路径设置为此参数。

trans-unit.source: If the state is set to shutdown-guest, by default the module will return immediately after sending the shutdown signal.
trans-unit.target: 如果 state 设置为 shutdown-guest ，则默认情况下，模块将在发送关闭信号后立即返回。
