trans-unit.source: If the affinity requirements specified by this field are not met at scheduling time, the vm will not be scheduled onto the node. If the affinity requirements specified by this field cease to be met at some point during vm execution (e.g. due to a vm label update), the system may or may not try to eventually evict the vm from its node. When there are multiple elements, the lists of nodes corresponding to each term are intersected, i.e. all terms must be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调度时未满足此字段指定的亲和性要求，则不会将虚拟机调度到该节点上。如果在虚拟机执行过程中某个时候不再满足此字段指定的相似性要求（例如，由于vm标签更新），则系统可能会或可能不会尝试最终从其节点中退出vm。当有多个元素时，与每个 term 相对应的节点列表将相交，即必须满足所有术语。

trans-unit.source: If the affinity requirements specified by this field are not met at scheduling time, the vm will not be scheduled onto the node. If the affinity requirements specified by this field cease to be met at some point during vm execution (e.g. due to an update), the system may or may not try to eventually evict the vm from its node.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调度时没有满足此字段指定的亲和性要求,则不会将 vm 排到节点上。如果此字段指定的亲和性要求在 vm 执行过程中的某一时刻(例如由于更新)不再被满足,系统可能会或不会尝试最终将 vm 从其节点上驱逐。

trans-unit.source: If the annotation stream does not exist, it will be created automatically
trans-unit.target: 如果注解流不存在,将自动创建。

trans-unit.source: If the anti-affinity requirements specified by this field are not met at scheduling time, the vm will not be scheduled onto the node. If the anti-affinity requirements specified by this field cease to be met at some point during vm execution (e.g. due to a vm label update), the system may or may not try to eventually evict the vm from its node. When there are multiple elements, the lists of nodes corresponding to each term are intersected, i.e. all terms must be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调度时未满足此字段指定的抗亲和性要求，则不会将虚拟机调度到该节点上。如果在虚拟机执行过程中某个时刻不再满足此字段指定的反亲和性要求（例如，由于虚拟机标签更新），则系统可能会或可能不会尝试最终从其节点退出虚拟机。当有多个元素时，与每个 term 相对应的节点列表将相交，即必须满足所有术语。

trans-unit.source: If the argument is set to always, then the running-config will always be copied to the startup-config and the modified flag will always be set to True.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数设置为always，那么running-config将始终复制到startup-config，并且Modifyed标志将始终设置为 True 。

trans-unit.source: If the argument is set to changed, then the running-config will only be copied to the startup-config if the task has made a change.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数设置为改变，那么运行配置只会被复制到启动配置如果任务已经做出了改变。

trans-unit.source: If the argument is set to modified, then the running-config will only be copied to the startup-config if it has changed since the last save to startup-config.
trans-unit.target: 如果该参数设置为Modifyed，则如果运行配置自上次保存到startup-config之后已更改，则只会将其复制到startup-config。

trans-unit.source: If the argument is set to never, the running-config will never be copied to the startup-config.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数设置为never，则运行配置将永远不会复制到启动配置。

trans-unit.source: If the auto-redistribute load option is left in its default off state, any desired rebalancing requires calls to rest api.
trans-unit.target: 如果auto-redistribute load选项处于默认的关闭状态,任何需要的重新平衡都需要调用rest api。

trans-unit.source: If the average CPU is above the target utilization, the autoscaler scales up until it reaches the maximum number of instances you specified or until the average utilization reaches the target utilization.
trans-unit.target: 如果平均 CPU 高于目标利用率,则自动缩放器会向上扩展,直到达到您指定的最大实例数,或直到平均利用率达到目标利用率。

trans-unit.source: If the build specifies a `RepoSource` with `dir` and a step with a `dir`, which specifies an absolute path, the `RepoSource` `dir` is ignored for the step's execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果build指定了一个带 "dir "的 "RepoSource "和一个带 "dir "的步骤,该步骤指定了一个绝对路径,那么在步骤的执行中,"RepoSource""dir "将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the building process was interrupted for any reason when cuncurrent=yes, the index becomes invalid. In this case it should be dropped and created again.
trans-unit.target: 如果在cuncurrent = yes时由于任何原因中断了构建过程，则索引将无效。在这种情况下，应将其删除并重新创建。

trans-unit.source: If the cache plugin is in a collection use the fully qualified name:
trans-unit.target: 如果缓存插件是在一个集合中,则使用完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the certificate at this location is not an Entrust issued certificate, a new certificate will always be requested even if the current certificate is technically valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个位置的证书不是Entrust颁发的证书,即使当前的证书在技术上是有效的,也会申请新的证书。

trans-unit.source: If the certificate signing request already exists it will be checked whether subjectAltName, keyUsage, extendedKeyUsage and basicConstraints only contain the requested values, whether OCSP Must Staple is as requested, and if the request was signed by the given private key.
trans-unit.target: 如果证书签署请求已经存在,将检查subjectAltName、keyUsage、extendedKeyUsage和basicConstraints是否只包含所请求的值,OCSP Must Staple是否符合请求,以及请求是否由给定的私钥签署。

trans-unit.source: If the certificates of the authentication is to be verified.
trans-unit.target: 如果要验证认证的证书。

trans-unit.source: If the check type is HTTP_STR_MATCH or HTTP_STR_MATCH, the string that you want Amazon Route 53 to search for in the response body from the specified resource. If the string appears in the first 5120 bytes of the response body, Amazon Route 53 considers the resource healthy.
trans-unit.target: 如果检查类型为 HTTP_STR_MATCH 或 HTTP_STR_MATCH,则表示希望 Amazon Route 53 在指定资源的响应体中搜索的字符串。如果该字符串出现在响应体的前 5120 个字节中,则 Amazon Route 53 认为该资源是健康的。

trans-unit.source: If the command prompt received in response is not matched correctly within the network_cli connection plugin the task might fail intermittently with truncated response or with the error message operation requires privilege escalation. Starting in 2.7.1 a new buffer read timer is added to ensure prompts are matched properly and a complete response is send in output. The timer default value is 0.2 seconds and can be adjusted on a per task basis or can be set globally in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 network_cli 连接插件中响应中收到的命令提示符未正确匹配，则该任务可能会因响应被截断而间歇性失败，或者错误消息 operation requires privilege escalation 。从2.7.1开始，添加了新的缓冲区读取计时器，以确保正确匹配提示，并在输出中发送完整的响应。计时器默认值为0.2秒，可以根据每个任务进行调整，也可以以秒为单位进行全局设置。

trans-unit.source: If the computer has 2 CPUs, it has total of '2' CPU time
trans-unit.target: 如果计算机有2个CPU,那么它总共有'2'个CPU时间。

trans-unit.source: If the configuration variable is set to 1 the proxycommand and other ssh variables are read from default ssh config file (~/.ssh/config).
trans-unit.target: 如果配置变量被设置为1,那么proxycommand和其他ssh变量将从默认的ssh配置文件(~/.ssh/config)中读取。

trans-unit.source: If the configuration variable is set to file path the proxycommand and other ssh variables are read from the given custom ssh file path
trans-unit.target: 如果配置变量被设置为文件路径,那么proxycommand和其他ssh变量将从给定的自定义ssh文件路径中读取。

trans-unit.source: If the connection still fails you can combine it with the enable_network_logging parameter. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果连接仍然失败,你可以结合enable_network_logging参数。例如

trans-unit.source: If the connections exceed this limit, the system marks the server as unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接数超过这个限制,系统会将服务器标记为不可用。

trans-unit.source: If the container already exists and its "config" value in metadata obtained from GET /1.0/containers/<name> https://github.com/lxc/lxd/blob/master/doc/rest-api.md#10containersname are different, they this module tries to apply the configurations.
trans-unit.target: 如果容器已经存在并且从GET /1.0/containers/ <name> https://github.com/lxc/lxd/blob/master/doc/rest-api.md#10containersname获得的元数据中的“ config”值是不同的是，他们在此模块尝试应用配置。

trans-unit.source: If the container should be killed instead of stopped in case it needs to be stopped for recreation, or because state is stopped, please use the force_kill option. Use keep_volumes to retain volumes associated with a removed container.
trans-unit.target: 如果应该杀死容器而不是停止容器，以防万一需要停止容器以进行娱乐，或者因为state已 stopped ，请使用force_kill选项。使用keep_volumes保留与已删除容器关联的卷。

trans-unit.source: If the current image digest should be resolved from registry and updated if changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前图像摘要应从注册表中解析,并在改变时更新。

trans-unit.source: If the database is a geo-secondary, indicates whether read-only connections are allowed to this database or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库是地理中学,表示是否允许对该数据库进行只读连接。

trans-unit.source: If the datacenter should be present or absent.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据中心应在或不在。

trans-unit.source: If the datastore cluster should be present or absent.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据存储集群应该存在或不存在。

trans-unit.source: If the default kerberos tooling has been replaced or modified (some IdM solutions may do this), this may cause issues when installing or upgrading the Python Kerberos library. As of the time of this writing, this library is called pykerberos and is known to work with both MIT and Heimdal Kerberos libraries. To resolve pykerberos installation issues, ensure the system dependencies for Kerberos have been met (see: Installing the Kerberos Library), remove any custom Kerberos tooling paths from the PATH environment variable, and retry the installation of Python Kerberos library package.
trans-unit.target: 如果已替换或修改了默认的kerberos工具（某些IdM解决方案可能会这样做），则在安装或升级Python Kerberos库时可能会引起问题。在撰写本文时，该库称为 pykerberos ，并且已知可与MIT和Heimdal Kerberos库一起使用。要解决 pykerberos 安装问题，请确保已满足Kerberos的系统依赖关系（请参阅：安装Kerberos库），从PATH环境变量中删除所有自定义Kerberos工具路径，然后重试安装Python Kerberos库包。

trans-unit.source: If the destination path actually exists or not
trans-unit.target: 如果目标路径实际存在或不存在

trans-unit.source: If the directory exists, then the working copy will be checked-out over-the-top using svn checkout --force; if force is specified then existing files with different content are reverted
trans-unit.target: 如果该目录存在,那么工作副本将使用svn checkout --force在上面检查出来;如果指定了force,那么现有的不同内容的文件将被还原。

trans-unit.source: If the disk's Wipe After Delete is enabled, then the disk is first wiped.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了磁盘的 "删除后擦除",则首先对磁盘进行擦除。

trans-unit.source: If the docker daemon cannot be contacted or does not meet the API version requirements, the module will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法联系到docker守护进程或不符合API版本要求,该模块将失败。

trans-unit.source: If the domain is not reachable, the domain is created in a new forest on the target Windows Server 2012R2+ host.
trans-unit.target: 如果域无法到达,则在目标Windows Server 2012R2+主机上的新森林中创建域。

trans-unit.source: If the domain name returned by klist is different from the one requested, an alias is being used. The krb5.conf file needs to be updated so that the fully qualified domain name is used and not an alias.
trans-unit.target: 如果 klist 返回的域名与请求的域名不同，则使用别名。该 krb5.conf 的文件需要更新，以便将完全合格的域名使用，而不是一个别名。

trans-unit.source: If the downloaded configuration should be stored on disk. Refer to the download option.
trans-unit.target: 下载的配置是否应存储在磁盘上。请参阅 download 选项。

trans-unit.source: If the environment variable KRB5CCNAME is available, the module will use this kerberos credentials cache to authenticate to the FreeIPA server.
trans-unit.target: 如果环境变量 KRB5CCNAME 可用，则模块将使用此kerberos凭证高速缓存来对FreeIPA服务器进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the environment variable KRB5_CLIENT_KTNAME is available, and KRB5CCNAME is not; the module will use this kerberos keytab to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 如果环境变量 KRB5_CLIENT_KTNAME 可用，而 KRB5CCNAME 不可用；该模块将使用此kerberos密钥表进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the feature installation or removal was successful.
trans-unit.target: 如果功能安装或删除成功。

trans-unit.source: If the field is set to false, then the object is visible within the controller-cluster and its associated service-engines.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字段设置为false,那么该对象在控制器集群及其关联的服务引擎中是可见的。

trans-unit.source: If the field is set to true, then the object is replicated across the federation.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字段设置为 "true",那么该对象将在整个联盟中进行复制。

trans-unit.source: If the file already exists, no data will be written to it. If the file has contents, those contents will be read in as the password. Empty files cause the password to return as an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件已经存在,则不会向其写入数据。如果文件有内容,这些内容将作为密码读入。空文件会导致密码作为空字符串返回。

trans-unit.source: If the file exists previously, it will retrieve its contents, behaving just like with_file.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件之前存在,它将检索其内容,就像with_file一样。

trans-unit.source: If the file exists, the server's certificate will be verified to be signed by one of these authorities.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件存在,服务器的证书将被验证为由这些机构之一签署。

trans-unit.source: If the file is already present on the device it will be overwritten and therefore the operation is NOT idempotent.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件已经存在于设备上,它将被覆盖,因此该操作不是幂等的。

trans-unit.source: If the file is already present, no transfer will take place.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件已经存在,将不会进行传输。

trans-unit.source: If the first address is greater than the second number, the numbers will be reversed so-as to be properly formatted. ie, 2.2.2.2-1.1.1. would become 1.1.1.1-2.2.2.2.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个地址大于第二个数字，则数字将颠倒，以便正确格式化。即 2.2.2.2-1.1.1 。将成为 1.1.1.1-2.2.2.2 。

trans-unit.source: If the first match is required, use firstmatch=yes.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要第一个匹配，请使用 firstmatch=yes 。

trans-unit.source: If the first match is required, use(firstmatch=yes).
trans-unit.target: 如果需要第一次匹配,则使用(firstmatch=yes)。

trans-unit.source: If the first number is greater than the second number, the numbers will be reversed so-as to be properly formatted. ie, 90-78 would become 78-90.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个数字大于第二个数字,数字将被颠倒过来,以便正确的格式化。

trans-unit.source: If the first port is greater than the second one they will be swapped.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个端口大于第二个端口,它们将被交换。

trans-unit.source: If the first port is omitted, 0 is assumed; if the last is omitted, 65535 is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略第一个端口，则假定为 0 ；否则为0。如果省略最后一个，则假定为 65535 。

trans-unit.source: If the given value exceed the total number of existing policies, the policy will take the last position but the evaluation order will be capped to this number.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的值超过了现有政策的总数,政策将占据最后一个位置,但评估顺序将以这个数字为上限。

trans-unit.source: If the gslb service is disabled, then the vips are no longer available in the dns response.
trans-unit.target: 如果gslb服务被禁用,那么vips在dns响应中就不再可用。

trans-unit.source: If the gslb service is enabled, then the vips are sent in the dns responses based on reachability and configured algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了gslb服务,那么vips会根据可到达性和配置的算法在dns响应中发送。

trans-unit.source: If the guest setting is isolated or host only, the mgmt_address does not apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果访客设置是 isolated 或 host only ，则 mgmt_address 不适用。

trans-unit.source: If the host doesn't yet exist, the label/name to assign at creation time.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机还不存在,则在创建时分配的标签/名称。

trans-unit.source: If the host should be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机应该启用。

trans-unit.source: If the host should be present or absent attached to the vSwitch.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接到 vSwitch 的主机应该存在或不存在。

trans-unit.source: If the hosts already exists, this will be used to uniquely identify the host to make any required changes
trans-unit.target: 如果主机已经存在,这将用于唯一标识主机,以进行任何所需的更改。

trans-unit.source: If the image is available in the host's Docker daemon's cache, it will be run directly. If not, the host will attempt to pull the image first, using the builder service account's credentials if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果镜像在主机的Docker守护进程缓存中可用,则会直接运行。如果没有,主机将尝试先拉取镜像,必要时使用构建者服务账户的凭证。

trans-unit.source: If the image used to run the step's container has an entrypoint, the args are used as arguments to that entrypoint. If the image does not define an entrypoint, the first element in args is used as the entrypoint, and the remainder will be used as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果用于运行该步骤的容器的映像有一个入口点,则args被用作该入口点的参数。如果图像没有定义入口点,args 中的第一个元素被用作入口点,其余的元素将被用作参数。

trans-unit.source: If the image you are attempting to use is not listed in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/linux/using-cloud-init#cloud-init-overview, follow these steps https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/linux/cloudinit-prepare-custom-image.
trans-unit.target: 如果您尝试使用的映像未在https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/azure/virtual-machines/linux/using-cloud-init#cloud-init-overview中列出，请执行以下步骤https ：//docs.microsoft.com/zh-CN/azure/virtual-machines/linux/cloudinit-prepare-custom-image。

trans-unit.source: If the interface name ends in a +, then any interface which begins with this name will match.
trans-unit.target: 如果接口名称以 + 结尾，则任何以该名称开头的接口都将匹配。

trans-unit.source: If the job providers a App Engine HTTP target the cron will send a request to the service instance .
trans-unit.target: 如果作业提供者是App Engine的HTTP目标,cron将向服务实例发送请求。

trans-unit.target: 如果job提供一个http_target,cron将向目标url发送一个请求。
